name: Defensive Psionics and Energy Shielding
description: Advanced techniques for energy-based defense against psionic and occult attacks.

cards.title: Constructing Energy Shields
cards.description: Developing a strong energetic barrier to block external influence.
bulletpoints: Methods for visualizing and maintaining energy fields.
Techniques for reinforcing shields against psionic attacks.
How to use frequency tuning to disrupt harmful energy waves.

cards.title: Counteracting Directed Energy Attacks
bulletpoints: Recognizing the symptoms of directed energy attacks.
Techniques for grounding and neutralizing negative energy fields.
Using harmonic resonance to disrupt external frequency interference.

cards.title: Offensive Disruption of Occult Warfare Tactics
cards.description: Flipping occult and psionic attacks back onto their originators.
bulletpoints: Using resonance reversal techniques to reflect psychic aggression.
Neutralizing curses, hexes, and energy siphoning tactics.
Developing active psionic countermeasures against manipulation attempts.
